about.intro: Witness the collision of genius minds and cutting-edge technology at IIT Dharwad's most electrifying Technical Fest - Parsec 6.0, a rendezvous with the future! Get ready to dive into the sea of circuits & algorithms, machines & robots, bytes and bits, zeroes & ones. Let your imagination and innovation take flight in this celebration of brilliance and creativity.
about.description: Parsec offers an incredible stage for emerging technologists to display their expertise and bring innovative ideas to life. Packed with events, competitions, workshops, and keynote sessions, it seeks to ignite a passion for technology and business in the brightest minds across the nation. Beyond the tech buzz, Parsec creates a vibrant experience with engaging cultural activities. Join this one-of-a-kind technocultural fest to explore, innovate, and have a fantastic time!

features.title: Experience
features.description: Participate in events designed to bring out the best in you

features.title: Networking
features.description: Connect with and exchange ideas with participants and also the tech speakers

features.title: Goodies
features.description: Each participant gets goodies! If you manage to win an event, you can get even better ones!
